query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST210 A USING(SELECT CAST(#G_MANDT# AS VARCHAR(3)) AS MANDT, CAST(#PSNO# AS VARCHAR(10)) AS PSNO FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 )B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSNO = B.PSNO
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET VKGRP = #VKGRP#, GBN = #GBN# , AS_ARA = #AS_ARA# , EDATE = HEX(CURRENT DATE), ETIME = HEX(CURRENT DATE), EUSER = #G_USER_ID#
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( MANDT, PSNO, VKGRP, GBN, MDATE, MTIME, MUSER, EDATE, ETIME, EUSER, AS_ARA ) -- 추가 VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, #PSNO#, #VKGRP#, #GBN#, HEX(CURRENT DATE), HEX(CURRENT TIME), --변경 #G_USER_ID#, '', '', '', #AS_ARA# )
